title: january 5: north talk, south talk (with mazie)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about a monumental day for North Korea and South Korea, as well as the difficult history between the two countries. Then, she talks to a fun musical guest. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
